page.title: 05Ghosts and Legends
page.content: Ghost Canyon is to be found in the disused Graig Fach quarry where Dyserth Castle once stood.It is believed that every full moon,the sound of a man and his dog could be heard-but never seen. Another legend is associated with the ancient remains found on Moel Hiraddug.An old witch was thought to come down from the mountain,once a month to look for something or somebody from Dyserth to take back to her cave. Three boys from Ysgol Hiraddug believe that they saw a ghost whilst playing one evening.They discribed it as a white figure which had a head or something under its arm. It was seen walking across the old Dyserth railway track near Graig Fach disused quarry.
